# Generating data

```{r generating data}

n_cluster = 4
n_per_cluster = 8
df = data.frame()
for(clust in 0:(n_cluster-1)){
  df = rbind(df, data.frame(cluster = clust, 
                            x = rnorm(n_per_cluster,mean = clust%/%2, sd = (xor(clust%/%2,clust%%2)+1)*0.2), 
                            y = rnorm(n_per_cluster,mean = clust%%2, sd = (xor(clust%/%2,clust%%2)+1)*0.2)))
}
df$cluster = factor(df$cluster)

ggplot(df, aes(x = x, y = y, col = cluster)) + geom_point()

```
